data.name: Hello CS Club!
data.author: Rohit Dasgupta
data.statement: Rohit has a very busy job greeting all the contestants who have shown up to the Suncoast December 14th Competition. Help him gree these users by sending a custom message saying 'Hello, ___!' where he he can customize the name
data.output: Print 'Hello, [Insert Name here]!' to standard output, where you replace [Insert Name here] with the string you received from standard input
data.preview: Explain the basics of this app!
